xml.data:
Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.7 Pañhāvāra » 2.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya » Indriya
Indriyamissakaghaṭanā
Kusalattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Indriya
Indriyamissakaghaṭanā
459.
1468Indriya atthi avigatanti nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte ekaṃ, naaññamaññe tīṇi, nanissaye ekaṃ, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte satta, naāsevane satta, nakamme satta, navipāke satta, naāhāre satta, najhāne satta, namagge satta, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta.
1469Indriya nissaya atthi avigatanti nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte ekaṃ, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte satta, naāsevane satta, nakamme satta, navipāke satta, naāhāre satta, najhāne satta, namagge satta, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta.
1470Indriya nissaya vippayutta atthi avigatanti nahetuyā tīṇi, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, nasahajāte ekaṃ, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte tīṇi, napacchājāte tīṇi, naāsevane tīṇi, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi, naāhāre tīṇi, najhāne tīṇi, namagge tīṇi, nasampayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
